title: Opposition Leader sits for Master’s in Environmental Science exam
content: Opposition Leader Sajith Premadasa has sat for final exams of his Master’s in Environmental Science.“Politics does not require any subject expertise but you can never think out of the box solutions if you stop learning. Just did the finals in 2 subjects for my Master’s in Environmental Sciences. A tough exam but I think I will be ok. Next stop NFT’s and blockchain” Opposition Leader tweeted.
